backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing application submissions with public submit endpoint and admin‑restricted retrieval sorted by timestamp.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping site features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short summaries for all frontend files used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining color variables and dark theme rules for the RICHUAL visual system.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document providing mount point and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining page routes and shared layout with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth with loading states and styling.
frontend/src/components/site/HeaderNav.t: Responsive header navigation with logo, desktop/mobile menus, and Apply CTA.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching authenticated/anonymous backend actor and refreshing dependent queries on change.
Hook fetching admin‑only application list using actor, sorted by newest first.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity, handling auth client creation, login state, and exposing identity and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Runs a query to check whether the current authenticated caller has admin privileges.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting that queries are implemented in dedicated hooks.
Defines a hook to submit an application via the backend actor, tracking submission state and errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom RICHUAL theme variables, typography, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/validation/applyApplica: Validates application form data and returns field-specific errors along with overall validity.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with styled sections describing RICHUAL's philosophy and system.
frontend/src/pages/AdminApplicationsPage: Displays admin-only application listings with authentication checks and conditional UI states.
frontend/src/pages/ApplyPage.tsx: Handles the application form UI, validation, submission, and post-submit confirmation flow.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero, concept, and ranks sections using Tailwind and navigation to the apply page.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Displays membership details, benefits, and a multi‑step application process with styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Shows four rank-based training programs with descriptions and focus areas in a styled grid layout.
Outlines core rituals with icons, descriptions, and practices, grouped in alternating layout sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for getting, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, and design assets for building the RICHUAL website, including features, themes, and image needs.
